channel.title: Be Zulu! Podcast
channel.itunes:author: DJ Djive, Kameren J (aka Lionites) and friends
channel.description: The Zulu Mixes: House, Techno and Drum'n'Bass sets mixed by dj's Djive, Kameren J and Lester. Discover the particular style of the Zulu Dj's: mixing old school classics with today's hits, vocal house on a a techno beat, original funk tunes inside a techno set, that's the Zulu Sound ! A varied and eclectic vision of electronic music, 'Be Zulu!'
channel.itunes:summary: The Zulu Mixes: House, Techno and Drum'n'Bass sets mixed by dj's Djive, Kameren J and Lester. Discover the particular style of the Zulu Dj's: mixing old school classics with today's hits, vocal house on a a techno beat, original funk tunes inside a techno set, that's the Zulu Sound ! A varied and eclectic vision of electronic music, 'Be Zulu!'

item.title: ZuluMix 41: DJ Djive (House / Techno)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive
item.description: Djive is on a rampage :) This little gem will make you want to press replay. A splendid mix as usual!
item.itunes:subtitle: Djive is on a rampage :) This little gem will make you want to press replay. A splendid mix as usual!
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 41

item.title: My Story Of House Music Part 2: Lionites (House)
item.itunes:author: Lionites
item.description: This one might be the first 'part 2' Lionites ever made. Hope this is going to last ! Beware: abrupt start :-)
item.itunes:subtitle: This one might be the first 'part 2' Lionites ever made. Hope this is going to last ! Beware: abrupt start :-)
item.itunes:keywords: lionites, house, old school, techno, deep house, deep, mix, zulu, be zulu, kameren, kameren j
item.jota:name: My Story Of House Music 2

item.title: ZuluMix 40: DJ Djive (Techno)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive
item.description: Djive strikes again with an enchanting deep techno mix! Sit back, relax and enjoy...
item.itunes:subtitle: Djive strikes again with an enchanting deep techno mix! Sit back, relax and enjoy...
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 40

item.title: ZuluMix 39: DJ Djive (Techno)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive
item.description: Santa Djive strikes again with a deep and sharp techno mix! Seems that Christmas has extended in january for music lovers :-)
item.itunes:subtitle: Santa Djive strikes again with a deep and sharp techno mix! Seems that Christmas has extended in january for music lovers :-)
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 39

item.title: ZuluMix 38: DJ Djive (Techno)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive
item.description: A stunning 2 hours mix of techno gems, genuinely cooked by our 'chef' Djive; an explosion of musical tastes and flavors that will delight your clubber's palate !! Massive!
item.itunes:subtitle: A stunning 2 hours mix of techno gems, genuinely cooked by our 'chef' Djive; an explosion of musical tastes and flavors that will delight your clubber's palate !! Massive!
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 38

item.title: ZuluMix 37: Lionites (Drum'n'Bass)
item.itunes:author: Lionites
item.description: A juicy, fresh and warming liquid drum&bass mix with a touch of spicy basslines. Bon appetit!
item.itunes:subtitle: A juicy, fresh and warming liquid drum&bass mix with a touch of spicy basslines. Bon appetit!
item.itunes:keywords: drum and bass,mix,kameren, kameren j,lionites, the lionites,drum'n'bass,zulu,jungle,couleur3,couleur 3,dj,drum&bass
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 37

item.title: ZuluMix 36: DJ Djive (Drum'n'Bass)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive
item.description: Return of the mighty mouse with a superb D&B set welcoming the summer and once again dedicating all our respect to the D&B scene !
item.itunes:subtitle: Return of the mighty mouse with a superb D&B set welcoming the summer and once again dedicating all our respect to the D&B scene !
item.itunes:keywords: drum and bass,mix,djive, dj djive,drum'n'bass,zulu,jungle,drum&bass,drum & bass,dee jay,part,zulu party
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 36

item.title: My Story Of House Music Part 1: Lionites (House)
item.itunes:author: Lionites
item.description: First part of a (theoretically) infinite series of Lionites' best house and techno tunes from his crate.
item.itunes:subtitle: First part of a (theoretically) infinite series of Lionites' best house and techno tunes from his crate.
item.itunes:keywords: lionites, house, old school, techno, deep house, deep, mix, zulu, be zulu, kameren, kameren j
item.jota:name: My Story Of House Music 1

item.title: KSDBLOI: Lionites (Drum&Bass)
item.itunes:author: Lionites
item.description: Got this one back from the archive ! Mind-blowing melodies and basslines, amen break on 80% of the tracks, that's the 1998 D&B flavour, Lionites on the old school, enjoy !
item.itunes:subtitle: Got this one back from the archive ! Mind-blowing melodies and basslines, amen break on 80% of the tracks, that's the 1998 D&B flavour, Lionites on the old school, enjoy !
item.itunes:keywords: drum and bass,mix,kameren, kameren j,lionites, the lionites,drum'n'bass,zulu,jungle,dj,drum&bass, oldschool, old school
item.jota:name: KSDBLOI (1998)

item.title: ZuluMix 35: Lionites (Drum'n'Bass)
item.itunes:author: Lionites
item.description: A fresh liquid mix ponctuated with some good old hits ! Kameren J appears as Lionites from now on, check it !
item.itunes:subtitle: A fresh liquid mix ponctuated with some good old hits ! Kameren J appears as Lionites from now on, check it !
item.itunes:keywords: drum and bass,mix,kameren, kameren j,lionites, the lionites,drum'n'bass,zulu,jungle,couleur3,couleur 3,dj,drum&bass
item.jota:name: ZuluMix 35

item.title: The Anthem Mix Partt 1: DJ Djive & Kameren J (House)
item.itunes:author: DJ Djive & Kameren J
item.description: House music as we loved it ! Hope we'll reach the goal we targeted sofar: mixing every classic house track we've been collecting and loving since we were kids. Here's the first one for your listening pleasure. Should bring you some good memories back when house music was at its best, cheers !
item.itunes:subtitle: House music as we loved it ! Hope we'll reach the goal we targeted sofar: mixing every classic house track we've been collecting and loving since we were kids. Here's the first one for your listening pleasure. Should bring you some good memories back when house music was at its best, cheers !
item.jota:name: The Anthem Mix Partt 1

item.title: The Ae Mix: Kameren J (Ambient)
item.itunes:author: Kameren J
item.description: We rescued this mix by Kameren J from our archives ! This was recorded in 1997 on a ('low quality') 120 min band tape that became very noisy with the time. But here it is thanks to Djive's denoising and mastering skills for recovering an audible quality, enjoy!
item.itunes:subtitle: We rescued this mix by Kameren J from our archives ! This was recorded in 1997 on a ('low quality') 120 min band tape that became very noisy with the time. But here it is thanks to Djive's denoising and mastering skills for recovering an audible quality, enjoy!
item.jota:name: The Ae Mix (1997)

item.title: ZuluVideo 01: I'm Shy Fashion Party @ Red Club (Lausanne)
item.itunes:author: Fabio
item.description: Our FIRST video experience: The Zulu Crew entertaining the Red Clubs' party people alongside with DJ Mathemathic, Kenshyro & Mr. Mike, Deborah from Sens Unik and Saian Supa Crew... Once again an eclectic and original concept for this great event ! Check out www.shy-wear.com for the party pictures !
item.itunes:subtitle: Our FIRST video experience: The Zulu Crew entertaining the Red Clubs' party people alongside with DJ Mathemathic, Kenshyro & Mr. Mike, Deborah from Sens Unik and Saian Supa Crew... Once again an eclectic and original concept for this great event ! Check out www.shy-wear.com for the party pictures !
item.jota:name: ZuluVideo 01: I'm Shy Fashion Party @ Red Club (Lausanne)
